profile_about.title: About
profile_about.paragraph_1: My full name is Rodrigo Soares Donini, but my friends call me simply 'Donini'. I gaúcho, from German and Italian origin. I live with my lovely wife Cláudia and my son Cícero.
profile_about.paragraph_2: Currently I'm located in Brazil, working remotely with WordPress, WordCamp Organizer and speaking in some events around the world.
profile_about.paragraph_3: I have some personal projects that run parallel to my life, most of them are shared on the internet, someones in Github, Youtube and Medium.
profile_about.paragraph_4: I am passionate about technology, gadgets, assemble and do my own things, simplicity and good music.

profile_quote.title: Favorite quote
profile_quote.quote: " If opportunity does not knock on your door, build your door. "
profile_quote.author: Milton Berle / Comedian, TV presenter and American composer.
